Posts.EditableText: Alex, would you ever consider allowing video embedding on the forum? I've known some forum admins consider it a security risk, but I don't know if that's the case with you or if you've simply never got round to setting it up.
Posts.HTML: Alex, would you ever consider allowing video embedding on the forum? I've known some forum admins consider it a security risk, but I don't know if that's the case with you or if you've simply never got round to setting it up.

Posts.EditableText: Is it a PHPBB option that can be simply enabled? Why do you want to embed a video anyway? Hardly anybody posts video links here.
Posts.HTML: Is it a PHPBB option that can be simply enabled? Why do you want to embed a video anyway? Hardly anybody posts video links here.

Posts.EditableText:
Just for things like movie chat. It would also be a good feature if anyone wanted to post video tutorials.

No sweat, though. It was more a query than a request.
